net.dean.jraw.http

Class RestRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dean.jraw.http.RestRequest

  • public final class RestRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for representing a RESTful HTTP request

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RestRequest.Builder
      This class is responsible for creating new RestRequests

    • Method Detail

      • from

        public static RestRequest from(java.lang.String method,
               java.net.URL url,
               java.lang.Object... formArgs)
        Creates a RestRequest from the given URL
        Parameters:
        method - The HTTP verb to execute this RestRequest with
        url - A valid URL
        formArgs - An optional array of Strings to send as form data. See JrawUtils.args(Object...) for more info.
        Returns:
        A RestRequest that represents the given URL

      • needsAuth

        public boolean needsAuth()
        Checks if this request needs some sort of authentication to be sent successfully.
        Returns:
        True if this request needs authentication, false if else.

        Returns:

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getFormArgs()
        The data to send as URL-encoded form data with a POST or similar request

      • getSensitiveArgs

        public java.lang.String[] getSensitiveArgs()
        An array of the names of sensitive form data arguments. These values of these arguments should be concealed.
        Returns:
        An array of keys whose values are sensitive

      • getEndpoint

        public Endpoints getEndpoint()
        The endpoint that this request is being sent to

      • isSensitive

        public boolean isSensitive(java.lang.String arg)
        Checks if the given key in the form data is sensitive
        Parameters:
        arg - A key
        Returns:
        True, if the key's value has been marked as sensitive. False if else
